product_name: Adventure Paddleboarding All Rounder Stand Up Paddleboard - 11' 6"
long_description: This stable paddleboard offers great performance for the novice paddler. And for the more capable paddler, it will transition from flatwater to the surf without missing a beat.
short_description: This stable paddleboard offers great performance for the novice paddler. And for the more capable paddler, it will transition from flatwater to the surf without missing a beat.
